Name: Athenians
History: The Athenians have good warships, have many naval technologies, and their shipyard can train marines. They also receive a free Stoa building, which grants +20% health for all buildings, and the Greek Theater, which increases territory influence for their buildings. Lastly, their hoplite infantry are very strong, utilizing the phalanx formation.

CivBonuses.Name: Silver Owls
CivBonuses.History: The mines at Laureion in Attica provided Athens with a wealth of silver from which to mint her famous and highly prized coin, The Athenian Owl.
CivBonuses.Description: Metal mining gathering rates increased by +10% for each passing phase.

CivBonuses.Name: Hellenization
CivBonuses.History: The Greeks were highly successful in Hellenising various foreigners. During the Hellenistic Age, Greek was the lingua franca of the Ancient World, spoken widely from Spain to India.
CivBonuses.Description: Buildings +20% territory influence while the Theatron stands.

CivBonuses.Name: Greek Architecture
CivBonuses.History: The Greeks are famed for their architecture and extent buildings.
CivBonuses.Description: All Buildings +20% health as long as the Stoa stands.

CivBonuses.Name: Othismos
CivBonuses.Description: Athenians can use the powerful Shield Wall formation.
